articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Congratulatory Message to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Congratulatory Message to Russian President 
   Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Russian President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin on his 54th birthday.
 The message wished him good health and happiness and successes in his work for the socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Guyana
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Guyana 
   Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Famous work of President Kim Il Sung "Let Us Bring the Advantages of Socialism in Our Country into Full Play" was brought out in booklet on Sept. 27 by a publishing House of Guyana.
 The work, published on May 24, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the essence and main characteristics of Korean socialism and tasks to bring the advantages of Korean-style socialism into full play.

articles.title: Anniversaries of WPK and DIU Observed Abroad
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana
articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana 
   Havana, October 6 (KCNA) -- General Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.

articles.title: DFRK Founding Proposal Supported in Ethiopia
articles.content:
DFRK Founding Proposal Supported in Ethiopia 
   Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Addis Ababa Group for the Study of the Juche Idea held a seminar on October 2 on the occasion of the 26th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
 The chief of the group in a speech said that President Kim Il Sung put forward Korea's reunification as the supreme task of the Korean nation, set forth the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the DFRK and the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation, which reflect the Juche idea, and devoted his all to the accomplishment of the cause of reunification till the last moments of his life.    
 Noting that Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles, the proposal and the programme as the three charters for national reunification and opened up a bright prospect of reunification, he stressed that the three charters for national reunification are, indeed, the banner of Korea's reunification and the most just and realistic programme of the struggle to achieve peaceful reunification of the country.

Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President
   Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on October 5 on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the independence of the country.
 Kim in the message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop in keeping with the desire of the two peoples and mutual interests.    
 And he wholeheartedly wished the Ugandan president greater success in his responsible work for peace and stability of the country and its economic development.

Delegation of Japan Kyodo News Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Japan Kyodo News Here
   Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan Kyodo News headed by President Satoshi Ishikawa arrived here Saturday.
 It was greeted at the airport by Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and Kim Chang Gwang, vice-general director of the Korean Central News Agency.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for EU Countries
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for EU Countries
   Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the Korea-European Union Friendship Parliamentary Group, left here by air on Saturday to visit EU countries.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao Party Leader
   Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Lao Charge d'Affaires ad Interim in Pyongyang Phonekham Inthaboualy on Saturday.
